resources.string: Network unavailable. Please try again later.
To enable, go to att.com/mywireless or dial 611
Authentication failed. Please try again later.
Service not supported. Please contact your service provider.
Network unavailable. Please try again later.
"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Contact customer service at (800) 922-0204."
"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Please call (877) 807-4646 from another phone to activate your 4G LTE service and then try again."
Make sure you have a good signal (multiple bars) and try again. If this problem persists, please contact customer service at (800) 922-0204 for assistance.
"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Contact customer service at (800) 922-0204."
Billing password does not match. Please try again.
To activate your phone, call (800) 922-0204 from another phone.
To activate your phone, follow the instructions included with your new phone or contact the Verizon Wireless administrator at your organization.
Social Security number does not match. Please try again.
Please wait while we prepare your phone.
This may take a few minutes

"Before you activate this phone, back up your contacts and turn off your old phone.
Once you start activation, we'll transfer your number to this phone and deactivate your old phone."
Your Verizon phone is now active. Your number is %1$s
To transfer your number to your new phone, your old phone needs to be turned off.

"We could not find the address that you entered because the street address could not be found, or the city, state, and zip code may not be correct.
If your city, state, and zip are not correct tap %1$s, otherwise tap %2$s."
We could not find the address that you entered because the street address could not be found, or the city, state, and zip code may not be correct.
If your city, state, and zip are not correct tap %1$s, otherwise tap %2$s.
We could not find the address that you entered:
Unable to update the current emergency address at this time. Please try again later.
Contact Verizon to activate your phone.
Your data usage is currently limited due to time of day or a data limit. You will need to use Wi-Fi to continue setting up your device.
"You don't have a Verizon Wireless plan or you've used all of your plan allowance, please contact Verizon"
Due to time of day or a data limit

IMPORTANT - EMERGENCY 911 ADDRESS REQUIRED" To turn on Wi-Fi Calling, enter the U.S. address where you want emergency services sent if you call 911. You can go to Settings and change this address at any time. It is very important to update this address whenever you change your location."

WARNINGS - EMERGENCY 911 CALL LIMITATIONS" When calling 911, always tell the operator where you are. Your 911 call will go over Wi-Fi only if the cellular network is unavailable. 911 call made over Wi-Fi may be delayed or unsuccessful; for example, if the 911 system doesn't recognize the address, electrical power is out, or your Wi-Fi connection isn't working. Emergency services will be sent to the address your provided above, so please update it as you change locations."
Network unavailable. Please try again later.
The address entered could not be validated by Emergency Service Providers.
Are you sure you want to use this address in case of an emergency?

"The city, state, or zip code that you entered may not be correct.
Please check the address and try again."
The city, state, or zip code that you entered may not be correct.
Please check the address and try again.
To use Mobile Hotspot, please call customer service to subscribe.

"Wi-Fi Calling lets you to make calls using Wi-Fi when the mobile network is not available.
To set up Wi-Fi Calling, you will need to enter a US address. This address will be used by emergency services in your location if you make an emergency (E911) call over Wi-Fi from this phone within the US.
We recommend you change this address when you make calls using a different Wi-Fi network so your location information is accurate. You can change your location any time by going to Wi-Fi Calling settings menu."
"To get started, enter your account's billing password:"
"To get started, enter the last 4 digits of your account owner's Social Security number:"
Unable to activate WiFi calling. Please try again later.
